original_text: Jehu shouted to them, ‘Throw her down!’ So they threw her down. When she hit the ground, some of her blood splashed on the wall. It also splashed on Jehu's horses as he drove them over her body.
korean_text: 이르되 그를 내려던지라 하니 내려던지매 그의 피가 담과 말에게 튀더라 예후가 그의 시체를 밟으니라

sentences.original_text: some of her blood splashed on the wall
It also splashed on Jehu's horses
sentences.korean_translation: 그 피는 또 여후의 말들에게도 튀었다

sentences.original_text: as he drove them over her body
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 말들을 그녀의 몸 위로 몰고 갈 때
